name: Winter's Love
description:
It’s been over a month since it happened.

                                          The Spirit of God spoke to us in a dream.

"Until the end of December, both of you must refrain from telling the other ‘I love you’."

"If you fail to act in accordance with my will then I will tear you apart, so that you may never look upon your lover’s face again."

This is a short kinetic novel made for Winter VN Jam 2020 about a couple who are told they can't act as a couple until winter ends. 

-

The current version is a beta completed within the Winter VN Jam deadline, but I'm going to be updating it with CGs, re-drawn sprites and better looking UI in the next month or two.
